name: retrospective
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a show of the work an artist has done in their life so far: a Hockney retrospective/a retrospective of Hockney's work

Add to word list
Add to word list
looking back over the past: He was the subject of a retrospective exhibit.
Add to word list
Add to word list
if a law, decision, etc. is retrospective, it has effect from a date in the past before it was approved: The new law will not be retrospective. He described stamp duty on property transactions as 'an unfair and retrospective tax' on long-term savers. See also
retroactive
